quotes.quote: The last three or four reps is what makes the muscle grow. This area of pain divides a champion from someone who is not a champion
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger, seven-time Mr. Olympia

quotes.quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau, poet and philosopher

quotes.quote: All progress takes place outside the comfort zone
quotes.author: Michael John Bobak, digital artist

quotes.quote: If you think lifting is dangerous, try being weak. Being weak is dangerous
quotes.author: Bret Contreras, sports scientist

quotes.quote: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary
quotes.author: Vidal Sassoon, hairstylist and businessman

quotes.quote: The clock is ticking. Are you becoming the person you want to be?
quotes.author: Greg Plitt, fitness model

quotes.quote: Whether you think you can, or you think you can’t, you’re right
quotes.author: Henry Ford, industrialist

quotes.quote: The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus
quotes.author: Bruce Lee, actor and martial artist

quotes.quote: You must expect great things of yourself before you can do them
quotes.author: Michael Jordan, basketball player

quotes.quote: Action is the foundational key to all success
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso, visual artist

quotes.quote: Things may come to those who wait, but only the things left by those who hustle
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln, 16th President of the United States

quotes.quote: Well done is better than well said
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin, American Founding Father and inventor

quotes.quote: All our dreams can come true if we have the courage to pursue them
quotes.author: Walt Disney, film producer and entrepreneur

quotes.quote: A champion is someone who gets up when they can’t
quotes.author: Jack Dempsey, professional boxer

quotes.quote: What hurts today makes you stronger tomorrow
quotes.author: Jay Cutler, pro bodybuilder and four-time Mr. Olympia

quotes.quote: If something stands between you and your success, move it. Never be denied
quotes.author: Dwayne ‘The Rock’ Johnson, actor and pro wrestler

quotes.quote: If you want something you’ve never had, you must be willing to do something you’ve never done
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson, Third President of the United States

quotes.quote: You have to think it before you can do it. The mind is what makes it all possible
quotes.author: Kai Greene, pro bodybuilder and artist

quotes.quote: Things work out best for those who make the best of how things work out
quotes.author: John Wooden, basketball player and coach

quotes.quote: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm
quotes.author: Winston Churchill, British statesman and Prime Minister of the United Kingdom
